content: **june 2020 update i ve revised this pattern to include circular knitting instructions the new version is now available as a free download here ** for anyone looking for a last-minute hand-made valentine s day gift idea done and done these little hearts make a perfect topper for a box of chocolates or a little handful of them will make your sweetie smile you ll need about 6 yards of yarn per heart and a foot or two of black yarn for eyes choose needles straight circular or double-pointed that are 2-3 sizes smaller than the standard recommendation for the yarn you re using to get a tight gauge you ll need a pinch of stuffing or scrap yarn for plump squeezable hearts
